attributes.action: Act aggressively, positively and historically NOW to set in place a NEW constitution and bill of rights for Britain.  Where ALL chambers are elected by the people for the people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A bill of rights for Britain is overdue, Britain can and must take this step.

rejection.details: The PM has already outlined proposals to reform Parliament Please read: http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19582
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
